meanings.definition: To apply a new layer of gold to something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to regilt the picture frame to make it shine again.
meanings.sent2: The artist regilted the antique mirror to restore its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The old statue looked like it needed a makeover, so she regilted it.
meanings.sent4: The sun regilted the leaves of the trees with its golden rays.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler carefully regilted the necklace to enhance its elegance.

meanings.sent3: The chef joked that he would regilt the dessert with edible gold flakes.
meanings.sent4: The sunset seemed to regilt the entire city with its warm glow.
